text: You want your EC2 instance to be able to access S3 and create new objects in a bucket. What's the best way to do this?

answers.text: Create an IAM role that allows access to S3 and assign it to the EC2 Instance.
Use the EC2 console to assign permissions directly to the Instance.
Create an IAM user and use AWS Configure to add Access Keys to the EC2 Instance.
Raise an issue with AWS Support.
